metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28044 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Irzip v0.640 was discovered to contain a heap memory corruption via the component lrzip.c:initialise_control.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-28044` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lrzip - 0.651-2ubuntu0.22.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lrzip package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.651-2ubuntu0.22.10.1').
